content: The starting screen every time is the camera. This is the dog whistle. It’s the frequency designed to keep old people out and keep the product cool and hip for young people. And make sure they can use Snapchat without mom & dad wanting to send Snaps to their friends or snoop on them. It’s super ironic because while Twitter is busy trying to simplify its product for newbies Snapchat is trying to do the exact opposite. It’s worth pondering.
